name: Beautiful Shadows
description:
Create smooth and beautiful shadows.


The plugin allows you to create beautiful shadows by simply dragging a 'light source' which casts a shadow on selected elements.


The plugin outputs valid box-shadow CSS styles. Grab the CSS values from the Figma Inspect panel (next to the Prototype tab✌️)



About the plugin

The shadow effect is achieved by layering and easing multiple drop-shadows to create a skeuomorphic shadow umbra and penumbra.


The plugin was cultivated by Josh W. Comeau's amazing read about Designing beautiful shadows in CSS.
